ind.title: Index
ind.description: Layer index in AE. Used for parenting and expressions.

cl.title: Class
cl.description: Parsed layer name used as html class on SVG/HTML renderer

ln.title: layer HTML ID
ln.description: Parsed layer name used as html id on SVG/HTML renderer

ip.title: In Point
ip.description: In Point of layer. Sets the initial frame of the layer.

op.title: Out Point
op.description: Out Point of layer. Sets the final frame of the layer.

st.title: Start Time
st.description: Start Time of layer. Sets the start time of the layer.

nm.title: Name
nm.description: After Effects Layer Name. Used for expressions.

hasMask.title: Has Masks
hasMask.description: Boolean when layer has a mask. Will be deprecated in favor of checking maskProperties.

parent.title: Parent
parent.description: Layer Parent. Uses ind of parent.

refId.title: Reference ID
refId.description: id pointing to the source image defined on 'assets' object
